metadata.name: PowerShell Web Access Installation - PsScript
metadata.comment: Detects the installation and configuration of PowerShell Web Access, which could be used for remote access and potential abuse

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('install-windowsfeature windowspowershellwebaccess')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('install-pswawebapplication')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('add-pswaauthorizationrule')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-username ')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-computername ')))

output.summary: Detects the installation and configuration of PowerShell Web Access, which could be used for remote access and potential abuse

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell Web Access installations by administrators References: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/powershellwebaccess/install-pswawebapplication, https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/cybersecurity-advisories/aa24-241a, https://gist.github.com/MHaggis/7e67b659af9148fa593cf2402edebb41
